message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product worth $12,000 at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.
Thanks for the offer Alice, $10,000 is a great starting point. However, I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. While we aim to accommodate all our customers, I must respectfully decline the counteroffer. Our current pricing strategy allows us to maintain the quality and integrity of our products. We are unable to match the $9,500 offer. However, I would like to extend a personal invitation for you to visit our showroom where you can experience the product firsthand and perhaps reconsider your offer. Looking forward to your positive response.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice.  $10,200 is still a bit higher than I'd like to go. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. This would be a fair deal for both of us, and I'm confident I'd be a satisfied customer.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of our product. In light of your latest offer, I am pleased to extend our previous offer to $9,900. This represents a slight adjustment that aims to find a mutually beneficial solution while maintaining the value and quality of our product. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.
